title: About
text1: Listing a carbon sequestration project with a major registry can cost hundreds of thousands of dollars, making it cost-effective for only large scale projects. This situation deprives smaller players of the economic benefits that come from participating in voluntary carbon markets.
text2: Lynx utilizes satellite remote-sensing technology to digitize the supply-side of Carbon Credits, reducing or eliminating the need for costly manual monitoring and verification. This solution provides full traceability to the original source for every tonne of CO2e offset.
